mcq.statement: Which educational institution was founded by Sahibzada Abdul Qayyum in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa (formerly NWFP)?
mcq.one_liner: Sahibzada Abdul Qayyum established the **Islamia High School Peshawar** in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, which was previously known as NWFP.

suggestions.topic: Services of Sir Syed Ahmad Khan (1817-1898)
